metadata.name: BABLETEK
metadata.description:
Work of Kastro, exponent of abstract expressionism where the strength and energy of its characteristic colors is combined with its peculiar style of calligraphic expressionism where the lines similar to writing lose their semantic behavior to integrate in the composition of the work. 

The NFT is created from handmade work and is ready to collect with a resolution of 800x8000 pixels and a resolution of 600 points that allows reproduction by the collector on any type of support with the highest quality. Kastroâ€™s work is already in more than 35 countries and works with collections and galleries internationally
